twcore.bots.multibot.freezetag
Class freezetag

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.MultiModule
      twcore.bots.multibot.freezetag.freezetag

public class freezetag
extends MultiModule

This class is sort of a variant of the zombies module. It is to be used when hosting a game of ?go freezetag.

Author:
Jason

                          java.lang.String message)

handlePlayerCommand

public void handlePlayerCommand(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String message)
This method is used to handle the !leave command for non-staff players. If a player is frozen and needs to leave mid-game, this'll spec 'em so they can go do their thing elsewhere.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player issuing the command
message - the command being issued

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerDeath event)
This method is called when a PlayerDeath event fires. Every time a player dies, we check to see if they're frozen/unfrozen, then we do the opposite.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class MultiModule
Parameters:
event - the PlayerDeath event that has fired

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(FrequencyShipChange event)
This method is called when a FrequencyShipChange event fires. Every time a player switches freq/ship, we need to update the HashSets so we can can then check for a winner. (This will also update the HashSets in the event that a player lags out.)

Overrides:
handleEvent in class MultiModule
Parameters:
event - the FrequencyShipChange event that fired

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerLeft event)
This method is called when a PlayerLeft event is fired. If a player flat out leaves the arena (via ?go or esc+q) without speccing first, the HashSets need to be updated.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class MultiModule
Parameters:
event - the PlayerLeft event that fired

doRules

public void doRules()
This method displays the rules of freeze tag in a superfluously perty set of arena messages.

startGame

public void startGame(java.lang.String name)
This method starts a game of freeze tag.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player who issued the !start command

stopGame

public void stopGame(java.lang.String name)
This method stops a game of freeze tag. If no game is currently in progress, it will yell at the dipshit who tried to stop a non-existent game.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player who issued the !stop command

fillFreqSets

public void fillFreqSets()
This method fills up the freqs sets at the start of the game.

doPreGame

public void doPreGame()
This method handles all of the pre-game stuff in a TimerTask. The TimerTask is used simply to delay the start of the game by 10 seconds.

determineWinner

public void determineWinner()
This method does the actual determining of a winner based on the sizes of the HashSets. Should one of the HashSets be empty, I do realize that it's a bit redundant to be comparing their sizes here, but it's not that big of a deal so shush. :P

doLeave

public void doLeave(java.lang.String name)
This method performs the actual *spec commands when a player issues the !leave command to the bot.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player who issued the !leave command

Specified by:

FreezeTagHelp the list of commands used by the module

cancel

public void cancel()
This method is used to cancel any pending TimerTasks should the game be !stop'd prematurely.

Overrides:
